name: Gun Swap (ProSmashy)
description: This game was made for the Secret Santa 2021, unfortunatelly, I found about this wholesome game jam quite late... So giftee, I apologise in advance, for any potential  bugs, because the game (obviously) isn't  finished yet.., but if you like the prototype, leave a comment and let me know if you would like to see further development on this game :) Happy holidays!
